title: E67 Trees
itunes:title: Trees
description:
In this episode, the team discusses trees with professor in the Department of Forest and Conservation Sciences at the University of British Columbia and author of "Finding the Mother Tree: Discovering the Wisdom of the Forest", Dr. Suzanne Simard.

Follow Dr. Suzanne Simard on Instagram @DrSuzzaneSimard.

Go to JimJefferies.com to buy tickets to Jim's upcoming tour, The Moist Tour.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
